email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I have a spot enquiry for 85,000MT of Iron Ore, Port Hedland to Qingdao, CFR. The rate is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is Oct 20-25. Let me know if you're interested.

Best regards,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you do better? Also, what vessel are you proposing?

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

The vessel is MV OCEAN TITAN, DWT 180,000, LOA 300m. She's a reliable vessel with a good track record. I can offer you a better rate of USD 18.00 per MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

Thanks for the update. USD 18.00 is still a bit high. Can you do USD 17.50? Also, can you confirm the laycan is still Oct 20-25?

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

I can do USD 17.75 per MT, and yes, the laycan is still Oct 20-25. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

USD 17.75 works for me. Please proceed with the booking and send over the recap.

Regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sarah,

Great! I'll send the recap shortly. Thanks for the business.

Best regards,
James
